projects.title: Lego Licensed Sets Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed the impact of licensed sets on Lego’s portfolio by focusing on the Star Wars franchise. The project revealed that 50% of licensed sets belong to Star Wars and identified 2016 as the peak release year. Data processing and analysis were performed using pandas (with optional numpy support) and pivot tables to extract key trends.

projects.title: SEM Campaign Builder for Furniture Retail
projects.description: Generated 930 exact/phrase match keywords targeting budget shoppers - excluded 17 luxury terms, prioritized 45 discount modifiers ('sale', 'cheap'). Structured 5 ad groups with product-keyword combinations.

projects.title: LCK Spring 2024 Esports Analytics
projects.description: Built 3 relational datasets from 1.2k matches: tracked 45 KPIs (KDA=4.2 avg, 63% win rate thresholds). Automated web scraping with Selenium/BeautifulSoup.

projects.title: LoL Esports Predictive Engine
projects.description: Developed & maintained 3+ years ML system: 68% match prediction accuracy (LCK/LCS/LEC). Processed 10k+ matches with 42 features (draft picks, obj timings, meta shifts). Daily Excel automation + Python retraining.

projects.title: Sales Pipeline Debugging
projects.description: Resolved 3 critical data issues: Tax calculation rounding errors (0.1% discrepancy), dynamic threshold validation for Total (±3σ), and NaN handling in 4.7% of Condition_1 checks. Achieved 100% data validation.

projects.title: EV Charging Network Optimization
projects.description: Identified 37% coverage gaps in rural areas, optimized fast-charger placement (150kW+ nodes), and correlated 92% EV adoption-growth with urban infrastructure. Processed geospatial + usage data from 5 government datasets.

projects.title: Sleep Health Risk Analysis
projects.description: Identified high-risk groups: Sales Reps (lowest sleep=5.8h, quality=4.2/10) & overweight/obese BMI (43%/40% insomnia rates). Analyzed 374 entries with occupation/BMI segmentation.

projects.title: Netflix Content Trends Analysis
projects.description: Processed 8k+ titles data: identified top genres (Drama/Comedy), analyzed release year trends (2015-2020 peak), compared movie/show ratios (70% movies).

projects.title: NYC School SAT Analysis
projects.description: Identified top 10 math schools (score >640), calculated total SAT averages, compared borough performance. Tools: Python, Pandas for data processing.

projects.title: Nobel Prize Trends Visualization
projects.description: Analyzed 900+ laureates: mapped category dominance (Physics/Medicine), country rankings (US/UK/DE), temporal trends (1901-2020), gender distribution (6% female).

projects.title: LA Crime Pattern Analysis
projects.description: Identified peak crime hour (12h), top high-risk area (Central), and vulnerable age group (26-34 bracket). Processed 180k+ records with time conversion and age-binning.

projects.title: Digital Fitness Demand Analysis
projects.description: Quantified COVID-19 impact: 300% home vs gym search growth (2020-2022). Key markets: US (score=85), Philippines leads SEA. Tools: Pandas time-series, multi-dataset merge.

projects.title: Avocado Supply Chain Optimization
projects.description: Identified cost drivers: logistics (38% of total), seasonal price variance (±22%), Mexico dependency (72% imports). Merged 4 datasets (suppliers/transport/prices) with outlier handling.
